page.title: 11ROBINSONS END FUN DAY
page.content: Robinsons End Middle School held a Fun Day on the 22nd June 1985.It was a wet day,but the stalls were still good.One stall was "Beat The Goalie" where you had to dribble a football round two cones and then you had to try to score past the goalkeeper.It cost 10 pence for 5 footballs,and you had two minutes to try to score with all five. At the darts stall you paid 10 pence for 3 darts,and you had to throw the darts into a "joker" from a pack of cards.There was a welly wanging stall where you had to throw a welly as far as you could!The furthest throw won a prize.The main raffle was the Grand Prize Draw with several prizes such as an infra-red cooker and a carriage clock.The main prize was a trip for two to Boulogne in France.Another raffle was for an autographed football signed by Coventry City football team.
